title: my client is not opening
body: i click lol, it pops up they league of legends and it just stays there, is this from me? or riot games? plz let me know

replies.body: Sounds like your version of League is being blocked from launching correctly. This can happen if your pc doesn't recognize League as a safe program, but you can stop that from happening by making sure your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) are configured correctly.
